title: Gboard officially expands ‘Grammar Check’ to all Android devices, adds text stickers for Pixel, more
content:
Gboard for Android keeps picking up new features to help you express yourself, and now Google is going a step further by helping out with your grammar on any Android device with “Grammar Check” and adding a new treat for Pixel owners too.

more…

The post Gboard officially expands ‘Grammar Check’ to all Android devices, adds text stickers for Pixel, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is adding Grammar Check to Gboard on Android, as well as Pixel-exclusive stickers that are generated from what you're typing.
